interactions.description: a request for a valid submit event

declaration.confirm: We confirm that we will administer the estate of Suki Hammond, according to law. We will:
declaration.confirmItem2: keep full details (an inventory) of the estate
declaration.requests: If the probate registry (court) asks us to do so, we will:
declaration.confirmItem3: keep a full account of how the estate has been administered
declaration.requestsItem1: provide the full details of the estate and how it has been administered
declaration.understandItem2: criminal proceedings for fraud may be brought against us if we are found to have been deliberately untruthful or dishonest
declaration.accept: I confirm that I will administer the estate of the person who died according to law, and that my application is truthful.
declaration.requestsItem2: return the grant of probate to the court
declaration.understandItem1: our application will be rejected if we do not answer any questions about the information we have given

legalStatement.deceasedEstateValue: The gross value for the estate amounts to £2222 and the net value for the estate amounts to £222.

value.executor: Burton Leonard2, an executor named in the will or codicils, is not making this application because they died before Suki Hammond died.
Jerry Curry3, an executor named in the will or codicils, is not making this application because they died after Suki Hammond died.
Hilel Ferrell6, an executor named in the will or codicils, is not making this application but reserves power to do so at a later date. They have been notified in writing.
Madeline Jordan7, an executor named in the will or codicils, is not making this application now and gives up the right to do so in the future.

value.name: Amal Mason, an executor named in the will or codicils, is applying for probate.
value.sign: Amal Mason will sign and send to the probate registry what they believe to be the true and original last will and testament and any codicils of Suki Hammond.

value.name: Eric Lloyd4, an executor named in the will or codicils as Inga Giles4, is applying for probate.
value.sign: Eric Lloyd4 will sign a photocopy of what they believe to be the true and original last will and testament and any codicils of Suki Hammond. Amal Mason will send the signed photocopy to the probate registry.

value.name: Devin Wade5, an executor named in the will or codicils, is applying for probate.
value.sign: Devin Wade5 will sign a photocopy of what they believe to be the true and original last will and testament and any codicils of Suki Hammond. Amal Mason will send the signed photocopy to the probate registry.

legalStatement.deceased: Suki Hammond was born on 6 October 1902 and died on 22 December 1983, domiciled in England and Wales.
legalStatement.deceasedEstateLand: To the best of our knowledge, information and belief, there was no land vested in Suki Hammond which was settled previously to the death (and not by the will) of Suki Hammond and which remained settled land notwithstanding such death.
legalStatement.deceasedOtherNames: They were also known as Giacomo Terrell.
legalStatement.intro: This statement is based on the information you’ve given in your application. It will be stored as a public record.
legalStatement.applicant: We, Amal Mason of ssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssssss, Eric Lloyd4 of ddddddddddddddddddddddddddddd and Devin Wade5 of xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx, make the following statement:
